name: Gili Lior
message: [Machine Reading, Fast and Slow: When Do Models 'Understand' Language?](https://www.semanticscholar.org/paper/Machine-Reading%2C-Fast-and-Slow%3A-When-Do-Choudhury-Rogers/2a215364e3fbe5a4c45b61dc5bd869399fa82661?utm_source=alert_email&utm_content=LibraryFolder&utm_campaign=AlertEmails_DAILY&utm_term=LibraryFolder+AuthorCitation&email_index=3-0-5&utm_medium=7734259) -- posted a few days ago, seems really relevant, looking at a different angle of coreference, but with a similar motivation.  I know the last two authors, they're really good.
